body:
The idea behind `ignoreSession` was to ignore the route for session purposes, but I agree it is/was too vague. I've switched over to this format:

```
...
'/clone': {
  '/': {
    component: CloneRecipePage,
    crumb: 'Clone Recipe',
    sessionSlug: 'recipe-view',
    slug: 'recipe-clone',
  },
},
...
```

With this approach, we can simply point to another slug and anything session-related will use that over the actual `slug`. This feels a bit better since the `routes.js` file now lets us define the redirect behavior without having to tie directly into the underlying breadcrumb/current URL stuff.
